pages.text: A weapon not belonging to a Kichiku star, but still a powerful Noble Phantasm.$(br)$(l)Robustness (EX)$(): Grants multiple buff effects to the wielder while held.$(br)$(l)Clairvoyance (A)$(): Arrows shot from the Hero's Bow receive extra enhancements.$(br)$(l)Bow and Arrow Construction (A)$(): The Hero's Bow does not consume arrows when shooting.

Hold $(l)$(6)[$(k:sneak)+$(k:use)]$() while holding it to change form. While in the $(e)True Name Release$() form, shot arrows cause large area, high damage—but the shooter will also suffer severe backlash.$(br2)$(o)Stella！！！——$()
